content:
for The Greenest Photo Ever.
Interpret the challenge as you will: "It can be literally a really green photo (but not of a green dress, that’s cruel). Or it can be a metaphorically green photo, whether that’s ecological or ‘green with envy’ or any other angle you can think of. In short, be creative!"
First prize is a Sony Cybershot DSC-S600 6MP camera donated by 
,  and there are two runner-up prizes of $100 Amazon or iTunes gift tokens.
In order to participate, you need a Flickr account (
). Then just 
, and submit a photo. You can use an existing photo from your Flickr photostream or take a new one.
title: Green photographers. Our friends are out to get you!
author: Maryking
